item.title: Boundary fence has rotted and collapsed, 20th August
item.description:
Thank you for your time and for this opportunity to share our boundary issue at 2 Thistlefield Close. The fence on the opposite side of our boundary has rotted away. We have moved the rotten parts (pictured) and we ask for you to let us know if this boundary fence can be replaced. This has been slowly breaking down for the past 6 years and today (20/08/25) we have taken down the rotting items and placed them in a pile next to our property, on our land.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Thistlefield Close, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trailer / burger van, 20th August
item.description:
This appears to be a food vending / burger type van. It has been permanently left in the free parking bays in Southwood Road since March and is preventing use of the space for others. We have also seen groups of youths around it in the evening and have chased them away; we suspect they are trying to either break into it or vandalize it. It is a concern as given the type of vehicle, it could contain flammable materials or kitchenware such as knives. It is attracting anti social behavior and this has been reported by local residents numerous times. Can I please ask what is going to be done?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Larchwood Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on grass bank opposite 1 Westdale Road, 20th August
item.description:
A number of sacks, carrier bags, boxes and suitcases of rubbish have been dumped opposite 1 Westdale Road on the grass bank. It looks like part of a house clearance. The remainder is at the top of the road. Already reported; FixMyStreet ref: 8049963.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westdale Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
